subject: Sands Of An Hour Glass Of Time
text:
Through the 
sands of time, 
We walk past life's  
Closed and open doors. 
When we think it's  
The Last one, there's  
Always one more! 
Full at one end, 
empty on the other. 
In the middle 
You will discover; 
All of your 
Hopes, schemes, love 
& dreams! 
Play them out 
Feel the fear! 
As you reach the end, 
Only your soul  
Will be there.
